description: Damien Stone's boyfriend broke up with him just in time for his birthday and the muscular stud is feeling understandably down. Luckily, Damien has great friends who are willing to go to any lengths to cheer their buddy up, even if it means taking a random hot passerby and tying him naked to their friend's bed. Lucky for the overly enthusiastic pals, the man they pick is the always hot and ready Justin Matthews who happily goes along with their plan, giving Damien exactly the birthday gift he needs to get out of his rut. Damien pounds Justin's tight hole all over the bed until they've both shot their big creamy loads all over Justin.
title: Booty For My Birthday
